section.title: Enforcing the Policy
section.para: Implementing a password aging and password length and composition policy applies to accounts when a new password is set. When introducing a new policy or changing an existing one, current active accounts must adhere to the new policy. Since these accounts set the password prior to implementing the policy, they have inherited the previous policy. OS Lockdown offers a module to Set Password Aging on Active Accounts.

Consider disallowing the secure shell service from accepting empty passwords in conjunction with the No Empty Passwords module. OS Lockdown’s SSHD Disable Empty Passwords will ensure this policy is enforced.
